header-content: We are construction carpenters. We live here, in the community. We come from different backgrounds, but we share many things in common. We give our best effort to serve our membership and support the needs of union contractors that hire us. We build houses, commercial and residential structures, highway and industrial infrastructure, shopping centers, local, state, military, and government installations. We promote excellence, work ethics, and values. We train our members with a certified apprenticeship program. we serve our commmunity by bring active participants in social and civic activities.
header-bottom: We are inspired in shaping a better future for working families.
